thread.title: Pic: Deepika with Jessica Biel-Camilla Belle
thread.title_full: Pic: Deepika with Jessica Biel-Camilla Belle

title: Pic: Deepika with Jessica Biel-Camilla Belle
text: Deepika Padukone: Quintessential desi girl Feburary 17, 2017 1 /56 ​ Pic: Deepika Padukone attends fashion show in New York with Jessica Biel and Camilla Belle Deepika Padukone’s love for fashion has taken her to New York – the actress is enjoying the ongoing New York Fashion Week in the Big Apple. After attending the Michael Kors show on Wednesday, the actress was spotted at the Ralph Lauren show on Thursday. Keeping her company were Hollywood beauties Jessica Biel, Camilla Belle and Chinese actress Li Bingbing. The gorgeous actresses seemed to have a whale of a time together with Camilla even posting a selfie on her Instagram account. The ‘When A Stranger Calls’ actress shared the selfie featuring her with Deepika and Li Bingbing with a caption that read, “@ralphlauren with these beauties #ralphlauren #RLrunway #nyc #nyfw”. For her outing at the fashion show, Deepika kept the look minimalistic. The ‘Padmavati’ actress chose a camel-coloured fringed midi dress, one that she paired with an overcoat and nude ballet flats. A severe bun and soft make-up completed her look. It may be a departure from her glamorous looks but she definitely made it work. She isn’t counted among Bollywood’s fashionistas for nothing! All Comments ()
